name: project-workflow
description: Complete project lifecycle automation with 7 slash commands for exploration, planning, session management, and release safety. Includes /explore-idea (pre-planning research), /plan-project (generate IMPLEMENTATION_PHASES.md), /plan-feature (add features), /wrap-session (checkpoint progress), /continue-session (resume context), /workflow (interactive guide), and /release (safety checks). Saves 35-55 minutes per project lifecycle.
